Most People Take Months to Find a Remote Job. So I compiled the best remote job websites for you.Whether you're a freelancer, a digital nomad, or simply looking for more flexibility, these sites have it all!1. SolidGigsIt helps streamline your job hunting. A monthly membership fee grants you access to a huge resource library with courses, interviews, templates, scripts, and other tools, all with the focus of helping you land more freelance jobs.https://solidgigs.com 2. JustRemoteTheir platform is built specifically for people to discover the best remote job opportunities from around the world, without a focus on a particular location or regionhttps://justremote.co 3. Dynamite JobsOver 100+ quality remote jobs are added each week to the platform—and searching for the one you want is customizable with the site’s variety of filters and functionality.https://dynamitejobs.com/ 4. Remotive you can search through all categories, including marketing. It’s easy to see when a job has been posted, where it is located, and what specialty it falls under.https://remotive.com/ 5. Wellfound Great features of this remote jobs website include discretion and salary transparency.https://wellfound.com/ 6. The MuseIt allows users to filter for remote positions and provides resources like career coaching and company profiles to help them land the job.https://www.themuse.com/ 7. Toptal Toptal’s primary focus is placing talented freelancers working remotely for clients like Shopify, and Thumbtack. https://www.toptal.com/ 8. Workew You can bookmark specific remote jobs that sound appealing as you browse, and even sign up for Twitter notifications so you’ll be alerted as soon as a new remote job hits the market. https://workew.com/ 9. HimalayasIt has a powerful visa and time zone filter that makes it simple to find the most carefully curated remote jobs.https://himalayas.app/ 10. 🎯 Responsable d'Applications IT – RUN & BUILD | 13 ans d’expérience | En recherche de missions Freelance ou CDIBonjour à tous,Après 13 années d’expérience dans l’IT, dont 9 chez Stellantis en contexte international, je suis à l’écoute d’opportunités en tant que :👉 Responsable d'applications RUN & BUILD 👉 Product Owner Build / Run ou Chef de Projet IT 👉 En freelance, portage salarial, ou CDI hybride🔧 Ce que j’apporte : ✔️ Pilotage complet du cycle de vie applicatif (maintenance, évolutions, gestion des incidents, TMA) ✔️ Encadrement d’équipes technico-fonctionnelles (France / offshore – Inde, Argentine) ✔️ Méthodologies Agile, Scrum, SAFe, Cycle en V, Culture DevOps ✔️ Compétences techniques : SQL, Java, Jira, ServiceNow, Power BI…💼 Derniers projets marquants :Responsable d'applications connectées pour la télémétrie véhicule (20 000+ utilisateurs dans le monde)Déploiement du Core Model PSA dans plusieurs pays européensGestion d’applications critiques APV (Service Box, Forcom, etc.)📚 Certifié : PSPO I, PSM I, DevOps, ITIL v4, PRINCE2, IREB, ISTQB Agile Tester🌍 Langues : Français & Anglais bilingues – expériences en environnement multiculturel🎯 Si vous cherchez un profil polyvalent, structuré, orienté delivery et amélioration continue, n'hésitez pas à me contacter !📩 Je suis ouvert à échanger autour de vos besoins ou de votre projet IT.hashtag#IT hashtag#ProductOwner hashtag#ResponsableApplications hashtag#Scrum hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Freelance hashtag#PortageSalarial hashtag#Paris hashtag#Remote hashtag#ChefDeProjet hashtag#RUN hashtag#BUILD hashtag#Jira hashtag#ServiceNow hashtag#Stellantis

Username: Philipe Delphino De LimaPhilipe Delphino De Lima
Post Content:
🚀 Open to New Talent Acquisition Opportunities | IT, Digital & EngineeringHello everyone,After a sabbatical leave and more than 10 years experience in large companies within international projects, I’m sharing here that I’m open to new challenges and opportunities as a Talent Acquisition or Tech Recruiter, focusing on Engineering, IT, and Digital roles.I’m a psychologist specialized in Psychoanalysis, with solid experience in full-cycle recruitment: sourcing, interviewing, negotiation, onboarding, and team coordination. Over the 10 years experience, I’ve recruited professionals from all leves as:🖥️ Software Engineers: Full Stack, Back End, Front End (Java, .NET, React, Angular, Node.js)📱 Mobile Developers: iOS, Android, React Native🎯 UX/UI Designers, Digital Marketing Analysts, Growth Specialists🛠️ QA Engineers, Tech Leads, and Management Roles🌍 International markets: France, USA, Dubai, Brazil, and Latin AmericaI speak Portuguese, English, French, and Spanish fluently, which allows me to work in multicultural environments and engage with talent globally.Beyond recruitment, I also have experience in team training, executive reporting, cultural mediation, and promoting diversity and inclusion initiatives.📍 Based in Brasília – Available for remote, hybrid, or international roles.If you know of any opportunities aligned with my profile, I’d truly appreciate your recommendation or connection. I’m also open to freelance projects or consulting collaborations.Let’s connect and exchange ideas!📩 delphino.phil@gmail.com 📲 +55 61 991910351hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#TechRecruiter hashtag#ITRecruitment hashtag#DigitalRecruitment hashtag#EngineeringJobs hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#RecruitmentLife hashtag#GlobalTalent hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#PeopleAndCulture hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#MultilingualRecruiter hashtag#DiversityAndInclusion hashtag#RecruiterNetworking

🚀 Open to New Talent Acquisition Opportunities | IT, Digital & EngineeringHello everyone,After a sabbatical leave and more than 10 years experience in large companies within international projects, I’m sharing here that I’m open to new challenges and opportunities as a Talent Acquisition or Tech Recruiter, focusing on Engineering, IT, and Digital roles.I’m a psychologist specialized in Psychoanalysis, with solid experience in full-cycle recruitment: sourcing, interviewing, negotiation, onboarding, and team coordination. Over the 10 years experience, I’ve recruited professionals from all leves as:🖥️ Software Engineers: Full Stack, Back End, Front End (Java, .NET, React, Angular, Node.js)📱 Mobile Developers: iOS, Android, React Native🎯 UX/UI Designers, Digital Marketing Analysts, Growth Specialists🛠️ QA Engineers, Tech Leads, and Management Roles🌍 International markets: France, USA, Dubai, Brazil, and Latin AmericaI speak Portuguese, English, French, and Spanish fluently, which allows me to work in multicultural environments and engage with talent globally.Beyond recruitment, I also have experience in team training, executive reporting, cultural mediation, and promoting diversity and inclusion initiatives.📍 Based in Brasília – Available for remote, hybrid, or international roles.If you know of any opportunities aligned with my profile, I’d truly appreciate your recommendation or connection. I’m also open to freelance projects or consulting collaborations.Let’s connect and exchange ideas!📩 delphino.phil@gmail.com 📲 +55 61 991910351hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#TechRecruiter hashtag#ITRecruitment hashtag#DigitalRecruitment hashtag#EngineeringJobs hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#RecruitmentLife hashtag#GlobalTalent hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#PeopleAndCulture hashtag#HumanResources hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#MultilingualRecruiter hashtag#DiversityAndInclusion hashtag#RecruiterNetworking

Bonjour, Je suis à la recherche d'un poste de développeur full stack en CDI ou en freelance (mission longue) en full remote ou hybride très léger. J'ai 4 ans d'expérience.Stack : Node.js / NestJS ou Java / Spring pour le backend et React.js + TypeScript pour le frontend. Base de données : PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, GraphQLExpériences : SaaS, parcours de souscriptionJ’aime apprendre en continu, tester de nouvelles approches, et j’intègre régulièrement différents LLM dans mon travail pour gagner en efficacité.J'ai conçu et développé mon propre SaaS (brewify.fr), aujourd'hui en production. J'ai mené ce projet seul, de A à Z mais je suis très à l'aise en équipe.Ma seule contrainte : pour des raisons de santé, mes déplacements sont limités. Je ne peux me rendre sur site qu’une fois par semaine maximum, si site en dehors de Tours. Le full remote ou un hybride très léger est donc nécessaire.Si mon profil peut intéresser votre entreprise ou votre réseau, n’hésitez pas à liker, commenter ou partager ce post pour lui donner de la visibilité.Merci !hashtag#opentowork hashtag#fullremote hashtag#developpeurfullstack
